#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= See it working! =

The APM that is mentioned at the end of video bellow is the awesome UAV platform [http://code.google.com/p/ardupilot-mega/wiki/home?tm=6 ArduPilot Mega].

!ArduPilot Mega is the UAV platform used to control flying robots like !ArduPlane and !ArduCopter.

<br/>
The camera control works fine with latest PTP Remote controlled cameras from Canon.

<wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e_8vO9JBHrw"/>

The next challenge includes several changes to turn possible a PTP solution based on CHDK. That's needed because Canon retired that PTP resource from newer !PowerShot cams. 

<br/>
Here you can see the OSD solution working. <br/>

<wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gD1JAz4oEDI"/>

MAVLink data is coming out from !ArduPilot Mega telemetry port and updating OSD panels in flight.
